message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a price of $1,100,000.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,000,000. I'm really interested in this product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and deliver exceptional value. How about we meet in the middle at $1,050,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $1,000,000. How about we meet at $1,020,000?
